results.byline: By Danny Hakim and Richard Fausset
results.title: In Trump Case, Texas Creates a Headache for Georgia Prosecutors
results.abstract: A Texas court is thwarting Georgia prosecutors’ attempts to compel testimony from Texas witnesses as part of a criminal investigation into former President Donald J. Trump.

media.caption: Sidney Powell, one of President Donald Trump’s election lawyers, is one of three Texas witnesses who have not appeared for court dates in Atlanta that are part of an investigation into the former president and his allies.

results.title: Many of Hurricane Ian’s Victims Were Older Adults Who Drowned
results.abstract: The storm, Florida’s deadliest since 1935, has been linked to the deaths of at least 119 people in the state, many of them older residents who lived near the coast.

results.title: An Abortion Ban With Unexpected Consequences for Older Mothers
